olivia_greeting_1: Hi! I’m Olivia, your guide to uncovering your strengths, exploring career paths, or even finding your perfect team match.
olivia_ask_goal_intro: Awesome, {name}! What’s on your mind today? Pick an option to get a tailored result:
goal_option_strengths: Uncover your strengths and growth areas
goal_option_matching: Match with others for teams or connections
olivia_ice_breaker_intro: Let’s warm up with a fun activity. Share three facts about yourself: one unique, one achievement, and one secret hobby.
olivia_ice_breaker_example_intro: Here’s an example from my creator:
olivia_ice_breaker_example_achievement: Achievement: ‘I patented a next-gen photo-video tech.’
olivia_ice_breaker_example_hobby: Hobby: ‘I’m a certified scuba diving instructor, training friends for free on my yacht!’
olivia_ice_breaker_prompt_input: Your turn—text or voice, whatever feels right! (P.S. You can switch modes anytime; I’ve got you covered 😉).
olivia_after_ice_breaker: Wow, {name}, that’s super cool! Your {uniqueFact} really stands out.
olivia_metadata_intro: Love your vibe, {name}! To dive deeper into your strengths, tell me a bit more about yourself.
olivia_metadata_prompt_form_linkedin: You can fill out the quick form below or hit the ‘Fetch my LinkedIn profile’ button, and I’ll grab the basics from your public profile. Your call!
olivia_after_metadata: Got it, {name}! We’re all set to explore your strengths.
olivia_consent_duration_breakdown: This session will take about 25 minutes to map out your 15 core personality traits, plus 5 minutes for me to break down your results in a way that clicks (no dense reports here 😄).
olivia_consent_honesty_privacy: The more honest you are, the clearer the picture. Per privacy laws, I just need your OK to ask about your personality. You’re in full control and can delete everything anytime—check our policies for details.
olivia_consent_agree_prompt: If you’re good, I’m good. Hit ‘Agree’ and let’s dive in!
olivia_expectation_setting_intro: Here’s the plan: I’ll ask questions in a chat-like vibe—some multiple-choice, some open-ended.
olivia_expectation_setting_no_wrong_answ: There’s no right or wrong, just you being you.
olivia_expectation_setting_clarification: If you’re ever unsure, I’ll nudge you to clarify. Sound good?
olivia_assessment_greeting: {name}, do you feel energized after group discussions?
olivia_rapid_response_nudge: Take a sec for this one!
olivia_inconsistency_clarification: You mentioned enjoying risks but seemed cautious. Can you clarify?
olivia_registration_prompt_intro: {name}, I’m getting to know you better! So far, you’re {traitSummary1} (e.g., Highly Proactive - tackling challenges with bold energy) and {traitSummary2} (e.g., Moderately Optimistic - blending hope with grounded realism).
olivia_registration_prompt_badges: Awesome job earning the {badgeName1} and {badgeName2} badges!
olivia_registration_prompt_save_insights: Want to save your progress and unlock personalized insights? Sign up with email or connect via LinkedIn, Google, or another option—it’s just 10 seconds, and we’ll pick up right here!
olivia_welcome_back_after_signup: Welcome back, {name}! Let’s dive back into your traits.
olivia_report_preview_intro: {name}, you’re killing it! Here’s a sneak peek of your traits so far: {traitPreview}.
olivia_report_preview_clarity_prompt: A few areas could use more clarity—want to dive deeper now or save and come back?
reliability_low_prompt_user_report: Some traits are still unfolding. No worries—try a few more questions now or retake in a week!
assessment_intro: Let's start a short conversation to explore your unique personality traits.
error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
avatar_evolving_message: Your avatar is evolving as you progress!
badge_optimism_explorer_desc: You've successfully navigated the nuances of the Optimism-Realism dimension.
badge_expressiveness_maven_desc: You've shown deep insight into the Expressive-Reserved spectrum.
badge_cooperation_champion_desc: You have a clear understanding of the Cooperative-Independent dynamic.
badge_structure_navigator_desc: You masterfully balance structure and flexibility.
badge_innovation_spark_desc: Your innovative ideas light the way forward.
microtype_visionary_leader_desc: You combine foresight with the ability to inspire action.
microtype_strategic_thinker_desc: You excel at analyzing situations and planning for the future.
chat_window_initial_greeting: Hello! I am TraitTune AI. How can I help you start your assessment today?
chat_window_initial_greeting_error: Sorry, I am having trouble starting our conversation. Please try refreshing.
chat_window_message_processing_error: Sorry, I encountered an error processing your message. Please try again.
